name: Ha-bee-tat
description:
You're a lost bee. Figure out what kind of bee you are, and find your way home. On your way, you'll meet many different kinds of bees!

Entry for the Bitsy Bees jam! This is my first bitsy game, and my first game jam entry ^^ didn't get as much done as I wanted, so it feels a little incomplete, but hopefully it's cute enough to make up for it!
